programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Saroo Brierley: Journey Back Home
programme.desc: 5-year-old Saroo Brierley woke up on a train heading 2,000km away from his home in India & thought he’d never see his family again. Accidentally orphaned, an Australian family adopted him but Saroo couldn’t let go of the thought that his family mighty still be alive. 25 years later, he embarked on a quest to find the truth and what happens next is truly unbelievable.

programme.title: Jennifer Asberson: When Rejection Turns Deadly
programme.desc: On September 27, 1992, 19 year old Jennifer Asbenson accepts a ride from a stranger after missing her bus to work. When the man asks for her number, she gives him a fake one to be safe and forgets about it, unaware that she has just refused the advances of a deranged serial killer. At the end of her shift that morning, she does not make it back home. Jennifer escapes twice, yet no one believes what has happened to her. 5 years later, his arrest would reveal the most shocking information.

programme.title: Jonny Kim: Launched into Adulthood
programme.desc: Jonny Kim changed careers three times before he even turned 40! Who would believe that this highly decorated Navy SEAL, doctor, and NASA astronaut would be hiding a tragic secret about his past? In the end, what his colleagues have to say about him will bring you to tears.

programme.title: Elon Musk: Revenge of the Geeks
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur, Elon Musk achieved the impossible with SpaceX and Tesla, but Elon’s success made people question his “real intentions”. A look inside his childhood reveals why Elon lived in fear as a child, and why he never talks about his father...

programme.title: Tupac Shakur: Fight For A Better World
programme.desc: Legendary hip hop artist Tupac Shakur left this world far too early, but it’s clear that he and his music had a lasting impact. Surrounded by violence and injustice Tupac fought for a better world.

programme.title: Zion Clark: No Excuses
programme.desc: Born with no legs, moving from foster home to foster home - where he was often abused - Zion’s life changed when he was adopted by Kimberli. From that point on, he was able to focus on his wrestling career and become a true champion, overcoming his physical differences.

programme.title: Eva Mozes Kor: Surviving the Unthinkable
programme.desc: Eva Mozes Kor and her twin sister were tortured in Nazi Germany. She has held on to this secret for 40 years. And now, she finally tells her story.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: 3 Steps Everyone Should Take Before The Medicare Annual Enrollment Period and 5 Critical Procedures Advantage Plans Have DENIED Coverage For in 2024! __
programme.desc: "Marvin Musick will walk you through the 3 crucial steps to take before the Medicare Annual Enrollment Period (AEP) begins on October 15th, and the 3 additional steps youll want to follow after the 15th. These steps are vital to ensuring you avoid any mistakes that could lead to financial hardships down the road. Don’t miss this valuable guide to prepare for and navigate AEP with confidence!"

programme.title: Haven't Yet Saved a Million. Can We Still Retire Early?
"Spend RMDs, or Reduce Distributions and Taxes With Roth Conversions?"
programme.desc: "Hawkeye and Elle are age 61 and in the 32 tax bracket. How should they get money into their Roth accounts for tax-free retirement income? Clark and Ellen are 69 and 68, expenses will pretty much be covered by their fixed income, but they d like to leave Roth money to their kids. Should they keep converting to Roth, or use required minimum distributions for their living expenses? Tom and his wife are 73, and fixed income will cover their retirement spending too. Is it advantageous to them to make three huge Roth conversions beyond their marginal tax bracket to reduce future RMDs? Should they keep things simple by leaving their money in an S&P 500 Index Fund? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 498 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA."

programme.title: "How Much Does It Take to Retire Comfortably on a $5k, $10k, or $15k/mo Budget?"
programme.desc: Have you ever been told that you need to have at least a million dollars for you to retire comfortably? Many people have been frustrated by the idea that theres an arbitrary magic number they need to reach to retire. The truth is, retirement planning isnt one-size-fits-all, and the amount you need depends on many factors.

programme.title: 5 Steps to Know if Youre on Track to Retire
programme.desc: In this video, youll learn the 5 steps to know if youre on track to retire.

programme.title: 4 Steps To Choosing A Better Advantage Plan for 2024!
programme.desc: Join Marvin Musick from Medicare School as he guides you through your Medicare Advantage options. With a staggering 8,767 plans from 200 companies, choosing the right plan can be overwhelming. But dont worry, Marvin simplifies this process for you! Marvin gives details on Medicare Advantage plans, offering clear, step-by-step advice on how to choose a plan that best fits your needs. Whether youre considering United Healthcare, Humana, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, or any other major provider, this video has you covered! Learn about the differences between HMO and PPO networks, understand your possible plan costs, and all the additional benefits! This video is a goldmine for anyone among the 35 million people making a Medicare Advantage plan choice in 2024. Plus, get tips on extra benefits like dental, vision, and fitness programs!

programme.title: Avoid The EXTRA 2024 Medicare Tax MILLIONS Will Pay!
programme.desc: Marvin Musick from Medicare School is talking TAXES! Tax Season is right around the corner, make sure you are making the Best decision during this annual enrollment period! Understand how the $900 billion Medicare program is funded and uncover the different structures for Parts A, B, and D. Did you know if high-income individuals pay an additional 0.9 in Medicare taxes? Learn about the Income-Related Monthly Adjustment Amount (IRMAA) and how it applies to Parts B and D, leading to higher costs for high earners. Confused about the Medicare Part B premium calculations? Marvin breaks it down, showing how premiums increase with income and how you can reduce your Medicare premiums by appealing the IRMAA charges with form SSA-44 if youve experienced life-changing events.

Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: Solving for Z | A Calculus of Risk
programme.desc: How much can we gain from the mountains? How much can we lose? Between our own perceptions and the reality of the hazards, how much space exists? And in that gap, how do we decide what we are willing to risk? Solving for Z explores IFMGA guide and father Zahan Billimoria’s relationship to the intoxicating highs and crushing blows of a life in the high-consequence environment of big mountain skiing.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: The Dream Factory
programme.desc: Join TGR's all-star athlete team as they travel the globe in search of deep snow, steep lines, and gnarly cliffs and couloirs on which to push the limits of skiing and snowboarding.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking in Gaspésie, Québec
programme.desc: A massive and rugged peninsula surrounded by the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, Gaspésie features a dramatic coastline where beautiful wilderness rivers meet the ocean. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks around the iconic Percé Rock and stand up paddleboards the Bonaventure River.

programme.title: Paddling Norfolk County Ontario
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: Night Bike
programme.desc: Brett Rheeder's segment was always going to be unReal's opening segment, so the pressure was on as he shot in the Canadian nightime. Despite a few struggles, he more than earned his spot in unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: The Foot-Powered Transition HD
programme.desc: Leap of Faith. What happens when the ‚Äòdream job‚Äô no longer fills up your cup? Jeremy and Selema explore the defining moment in their careers when they had to risk it all and pursue their passions.

programme.title: Sail For Surf
programme.desc: Collin Martins is a chef with only one goal in mind: surfing. The virus started at the age of 3 when his parents put him on a surfboard in Cap Ferret. It often starts like this. But the course of Collin and his passion for surfing is really atypical and unique. In his quest for a wave, he decides to cross a step in 2017 when he wanted to be autonomous on the peninsula with a sailboat.

programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: Terror in the Jungle (1968)
programme.desc: Little boy Henry survives a plane crash in the Amazon jungle. He's discovered by a tribe of vicious savages who plan on sacrificing him. Meanwhile, Henry's father ventures into the jungle to find the missing lad before it's too late.

programme.title: UNFORGOTTEN
programme.desc: Professor James Earl Medina is a renowned University Professor and a loving family man. But someone from his dark past decided that they want revenge for something that the good professor did almost thirty years ago. The good professor has no choice but to go back to his former, tragic life in order to save his family. What follows is a collision between the professor and those who want to hurt him and his family.

programme.title: RUSTIN
programme.desc: Rustin is the story of Billy Stagen - former football hero, present small town sheriff and hero to everyone but himself. His comfortable way of life goes for a 180 as his 16 year old daughter that he has never met is brought into his life. Conflict comes to a head as Billy tries to raise his daughter and deal with the school thugs that are causing trouble in town.

programme.title: MISS SOUTH PACIFIC: BEAUTY AND THE SEA
programme.desc: Indigenous beauty pagent contestants from South Pacific countries challenge developed nations to reduce carbon emissions before their island homes are submerged by rising seas. Fierce, passionate, and articulate, the Queens know that climate change is an issue that cannnot be addressed by one country alone. The entire world has a responsibility to reverse the tide before Pacific Islanders are swallowed up by the sea.

programme.title: Guard Liping Conference
programme.desc: In order to study the marching direction of the Red Army, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to find a meeting place suitable for the Politburo to hold a safe meeting on the way. Ahead of the main force, Sword of Xingguo scouted a temporarily vacant mansion in Liping County and arranged it as the venue. The sword of Xingguo was responsible for the peripheral security mission, successfully shattered the raid plan of the enemy rangers, and ensured the smooth holding of the Politburo meeting. The resolution of the meeting changed the original plan of returning troops to western Hunan, and made a strategic decision to go north to Wu River. In early January 1935, during the Monkey Field Conference of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered Sword of Xingguo to go to the Wu River to reconnaissance and seize the ferry. Sword of Xingguo braved the severe cold and rapids to swim across the Wu River at night to investigate the enemys fortress and defense situation, and stole an enemys ferry to return. In the process, Man Zai joined the Sword of Xingguo.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2016

programme.title: Anirudh laughs at rumors about his marriage!
programme.desc: Anirudh Ravichander is an Indian film composer and singer. He made his debut in the Tamil film, 3 directed by Aishwarya. The song, ""Why This Kolaveri Di"", which Anirudh had composed for the Tamil film 3, went viral on YouTube and tracked more than 85 million views. His subsequent albums have all become commercial successes and he has won acclaim from critics for his soundtrack music and background recordings.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 26
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 19
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: Water, Water Every Where
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: SWOOPER SUNDAR
programme.desc: Chai Raja goes away on vacation and Sundar is super proud to be left in charge- Sundar slips into the sous-chef role and manages to keep the customers happy despite Bashas meddling. After a particularly hectic service, Sundar believes he has earned the right to kick back and opens his own little easy chair (modeled after Chai Rajas) to bask when he spots a beautiful poodle. Boing! Sundars heart goes a-thump and he leaps up all ready to impress the poodle. He bounds over and invites her in all Casanova style the hotel is his after all for the day- or almost. The poodle is intrigued and agrees but no sooner they take two steps that a street smart handsome hound shows up and decides that the poodle should be his arm candy. Sundar, annoyed tries to impress the poodle with his hotelier skills but the hound manages to downplay or disrupt Sundars serenading by showing off his own street smarts. Basha sees this as a perfect opportunity to lay hands on some fritters and impishly adds to Sundars woes by pranking him. Sundar must now handle both Basha and the hound as he tries to impress his lady love but the tension literally hits the roof and sends everything crashing just as Chai Raja cycles back in. The poodle gives Sundar the cold shoulder and Chai Raja a broom to clean up the mess!

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Let Me Fly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: E. TEA
programme.desc: Sundar is on special patrol as Chai Raja has a huge order coming up and is working at night as well. It is extremely tough for Sundar to keep awake and he grabs a novel about aliens ...but it gives him the heebie-jeebies. Basha, sneaking up to snatch some fries notices Sundars nervous state of mind and decides to have some fun. Basha using his circus skills drives Sundar up the wall creating eerie sounds, shadow-dancing aliens and dangling light sabres (fireflies about a stick of bamboo). Chai Raja who believes he deserves his beauty sleep is annoyed by Sundars repeated shrieks and screams and issues an ultimatum- shut up or sleep out. Sundar takes one peek at the freezing night outside and decides to stay quiet. Basha gleefully chuckles- now it will just get better! He can rankle Sundar no end and the latter cant even utter a squeak else he will be chucked out the hotel. But Basha doesnt account for Sundars absolute aversion at the idea of being chucked out. Sundar rallies the few grey cells in his brain and decides to show the alien a thing or two. What ensues is mayhem that culminates in a blow-up ends in all three- Chai Raja, Sundar and Basha- snoozing on Bashas hammock as the hotel is extra-terrestrial style shot off into space!

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Cinema Night
programme.desc: Blockbusters have released and Don and Colonel are in the theatre to get tickets. But the naughty rats pick their pocket and buy tickets. Now the dogs are penniless and would go to any extend to get into the theatre. But when the trio enters the picture, the poor dogs suffer like anything. But, Larry Marly and Charly will end up in deep mess. Wait and watch!

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: The tale of a toad
programme.desc: The twins help a toad who is rejected because he is so ugly.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: One of these days
programme.desc: The twins help a nervous Tortoise -whose only friend is a face drawn on a rock-to find the courage to make friends.

programme.title: Top Car
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Slow down in tempo town
programme.desc: The twins are in a city where everyone lives in a frantic manner. They run fast from here and there, talking so fast that you do not understand anything. They must find a way to re-establish in the city a liveable rhythm

programme.title: The Note
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: Bottle Cap
programme.desc: Small yet that doesnt stop our DIY geniuses from coming up with something fun

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: The Toy Room – Steadfast Ti Soldier
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the “Steadfast Tin Soldier”, having been called out by the soldier’s toy companions. SANDRA, who has always dreamt of changing this story’s tragic ending, hopes she will be able to prevent the Soldier and the Ballerina from being thrown into the fire. But, once they arrive in the toys’ room, it does not take SANDRA long to realise that her mission is going to be very difficult indeed. The evil JACK-IN-THE-BOX has taken the SOLDIER prisoner and threatens to melt him down into a useless lump of tin if the BALLERINA does not agree to marry him.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Petunias – Snow White Case 3
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, where they find her and the 7 DWARVES asleep around the table. The lethal apple has mysteriously fallen into the soup cauldron and they have all been poisoned. SANDRA comes up with a possible solution: to find, in addition to the PRINCE, 7 DWARF PRINCESSES capable of awaking the DWARVES with a kiss of love. The evil STEPMOTHER will do everything she can to prevent her.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: The Magic Arp – The 12 Dancing Princesses
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of the 12 DANCING PRINCESSES, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by their father. The 12 PRINCESSES have mysteriously disappeared, as has BRUNO, a retired soldier who had been sent by the KING to spy on his daughters. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation and will find the PRINCESSES in a magic underground world. But the 12 PRINCESSES have remained frozen in the middle of a dance, due to the theft of the MAGIC HARP, which gave life to that world. SANDRA and FO will have to find the magic harp and return it to its place, in order to bring the 12 PRINCESSES back to life

programme.title: The Magical Flying Horse
programme.desc: The spoilt nephew of the Grand Vizier comes to town and there is a competition to make the boy who has everything something to make him smile for his birthday. When Jamillah asks him what he wants, he asks for a flying horse! Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie do their best to make a flying horse but its beyond Genies powers. In the end Jamillah saves the day by making the boy an origami paper horse with wings that makes him smile.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: The Shape Shifter's Apprentice
programme.desc: The Shape Shifter returns with an apprentice in the form of a talking lizard whom she forces to help her steal the lamp. She disguises herself as Aladdins mum and tricks our heroes into leaving the lamp unattended, demanding that Genie make her the new ruler of Baghdad. But the lizard has grown rather fond of Jamillah and Aladdin and decides to help them rather than the Shape Shifter. When the Shape Shifter drags Genie into the town square they see an opportunity and the apprentice turns into an identical lamp to mislead her and lure her away so that they can steal Genie back.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Mom-Bot
programme.desc: When Fred’s parents leave him home alone, he tries to throw the coolest party in history—until Principal Darling checks up on him. Friday replicates Fred’s mom, and Mombot puts the Principal at ease, before short-circuiting, and making the party extremely uncool.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White – Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
programme.desc: Tras pasar siete años en la cárcel por asesinato, Dina logra demostrar su inocencia y obtener su libertad.

programme.title: La ciega vidente
programme.desc: El destino vuelve a unir a Iván y Karina y él se da cuenta de que sus sentimientos no se han desvanecido.

programme.title: El doctor - Madre e hijo
programme.desc: Serguéi, un talentoso médico cirujano, sale de la cárcel. Él solo quiere que su vida vuelva a la normalidad.

programme.title: El doctor - Madre e hijo
programme.desc: Serguéi, un talentoso médico cirujano, sale de la cárcel. Él solo quiere que su vida vuelva a la normalidad.

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: In this longer cartoon, Raggedy Ann's little girl mistress is seriously ill and needs sunlight to recover. Raggedy Ann sets off on a mission to the sun and other elements to make Winter end early. works a minor miracle, with the help of the elements.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Birth of a Notion 1947
programme.desc: Daffy Duck cons a dog named Leopold into offering him a stay in his house, but he has to hide Daffy from his master, a Peter-Lorre style mad scientist who needs a duck's wishbone.

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Sinbad the Sailor 1935
programme.desc: Sinbad battles a band of pirates at sea and on a tropical isle. A giant bird rescues him, and he ends up back on his ship with the pirates' treasure

programme.title: Made for Each Other 1939
programme.desc: While on a business trip, an ambitious young lawyer meets and immediately falls in love with a stranger. They wed the following day, and tragedy soon strikes.

programme.title: No Noise-1923
programme.desc: The gang pays Mickey a visit at the hospital. They switch vaccination orders with another group of kids, but the staff catches on and gives them false diseases to worry about.

programme.title: The Bashful Bachelor-1942
programme.desc: Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband

programme.title: The Lucky Dog 1921
programme.desc: In their first screen appearance together, Stan plays a penniless dog lover and Oliver plays a crook who tries to rob him and his new paramour.

programme.title: Balloonatic 1923
programme.desc: A hapless amusement park attendant finds his run away balloon ride has left him in a strange predicament

programme.title: Disorder in the Court 1936
programme.desc: The stooges are witnesses at a trial where their friend, a dancer at a nightclub where they are musicians, is accused of murder. The stooges manage to disrupt the proceedings but save the day when they discover the real murderer's identity.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!

programme.title: Guest Roy Wood Jr. - City Limits
programme.desc: Comedian Roy Wood Jr. talks fatherhood, performing at the White House Correspondents' Dinner, and his new show, Tribulations. He also speaks on the current state of Hip-Hop and why we need each other.

programme.title: Guest Noah Lyles
programme.desc: Noah Lyles in his first podcast interview since the Olympics. We talk about how he won the 100m and what happened with him and Covid and the 200m. Also: what makes him such a dominant athlete and what he thinks about during the race and why he feels controlled by the Olympics. An epic conversation with the gold medal winning fastest man in the world.

programme.title: Guest Symone Sanders
programme.desc: Symone Sanders is an MSNBC star who has been an advisor to Joe Biden, Kamala Harris and Bernie Sanders. She loves politics and understands what the game is all about. Great convo about broadcasting and working closely with major political icons.

programme.title: June 4, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 4, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Bae Sadè
programme.desc: Digital Content Creator and host of the 2023 Banjee Boombox, Bae Sadè shares her journey as a trans woman, dealing with rejection in her family, and working with Gucci Mane. She also dishes on the importance of the forthcoming Banjee Boombox (A Hip Hop 50 Celebration Featuring LGBTQ+ Performing Artists) event slated for Saturday, August 5th at Governors Island.

programme.title: Jack y Jill
programme.desc: Una adaptación terrorífica de la canción infantil Jack y Jill. Un grupo de amigos afligidos por una pérdida reciente se reúnen sólo para descubrir que están siendo perseguidos por Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Krampus 2: El Diablo Regresa
programme.desc: Cinco años después del asesinato de su esposa y la desaparición de su hija, el ex policía Jeremy Duffin es traído de vuelta para ayudar en la caza de un monstruo de Yuletide que castiga a los niños que han sido «traviesos». A medida que el monstruo se vuelve más errático e impredecible, Jeremy descubre la verdad sobre la desaparición de su hija y el destino que le ha deparado una fuente improbable. ¿Podrá Jeremy acabar finalmente con la pesadilla del monstruo navideño que ha aterrorizado a este pueblo durante años?

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Calvario "El Bien y El Mal"
programme.desc: En esta vida hay dos modos de vivir, el del bien y el del mal, paralelo y horizontal, esta historia llena de drama, acción y suspenso nos lleva a estos dos lados casi siempre elegimos voluntariamente pero en un conflicto entre la vida y la muerte y por salvar la vida llegas a traicionar a tu mejor amigo sin saber que la vida da vueltas.

programme.title: Bendita Suerte
programme.desc: En la provincia de Oaxaca vive Pedro después de la muerte de su mamá decide de salir de su pueblo para buscar algo mejor ya que no tiene a nadie, se va al pueblo de Ixtapaluca, México. empieza a trabajar muy duro para vivir su sueño de ser cantante. Pero la vida le tiene muchas sorpresas

programme.title: 500 Años de Carcel
programme.desc: En Baja California viven un grupo de delincuentes Gerardo, Clemente, Valdemar, y Benjamin el líder del grupo Christian tiene todo el pueblo bajo control, y sus colegas tienen negocios limpios para que la ley no sospeche nada. Para trabajar en paz compran al jefe de la policía del pueblo, pero no todo lo que brilla es oro ya que las esposas y amantes de estos narcotraficantes están cansadas de las humillaciones de sus parejas, y con la ayuda del comandante planean una venganza mortal.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Canon: Fidelidad al Límite
programme.desc: Mariana de 35 años, es una arquitecta que trabaja y es socia de un importante despacho de arquitectos, está casada con Julián de 40 años, quien es corresponsal de guerra. Está enamorados, felices, con relación sexual cotidiana. Son padre de dos hijos de 14 y 17 año. En el juego sexual, Julián menciona que no le importaría la infidelidad a condición de estar enterado del hecho con detalles.

programme.title: Amar
programme.desc: Carlos quiere pero Susana no. Joel no quiere pero Patricia lo obliga. Gabriel lo espera pero Martha no se lo da. Amado lo busca con una gringa y lo pierde. Benito lo tiene toda la vida. Concha se lo lleva más allá del sistema solar. Todos lo quieren y todos lo dan pero unos no lo reciben y otros quieren más. Así es Amar.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: Distopia
programme.desc: Impulsados por antiguos planes esotéricos, poderosas elites ocultas emplean armas bioquímicas, guerra psicológica, cuarentenas mundiales, e incluso magia negra para controlar el futuro de la humanidad y alcanzar la inmortalidad

programme.title: Los Vigilantes del Ródano
programme.desc: Octavio, un misterioso hombre que se dedica a acoger a personas con pasados di3ciles recibe a Carmela, una periodista de espectáculos sin escrúpulos; Román, un arrogante músico de rock y Diego, un cínico escritor autor de la exitosa trilogía “Johnny King”. Todos ellos se encontrarán atrapados en un enigmá6co estudio de grabación. Por más que lo intentan, no logran salir de este lugar. Se ven obligados a tratar con los músicos invitados para grabar allí y las situaciones confusas que con ellos se generan. Todo esto mientras intentan averiguar cómo conseguir escapar del estudio y encontrar la razón por la cual se encuentran recluídos

programme.title: OFF MENU
programme.desc: In “OFF MENU,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though we might not feel ready for this season of our lives, God has already prepared us for the exact assignment that we are designed to accomplish.

programme.title: The Lord Will Lighten Your Load
programme.desc: When you’ve been hurt, it can be hard to keep hoping. But God wants to lift the weight you’ve been carrying today. Learn from the life of Israel (Jacob, Jacob), how God will give you a strategy to unburden your heart and move forward.

programme.title: When God Gets Ready
programme.desc: People label, but God names. You don’t have to chase identity or earn worth, because you’ve always been called, loved, and set apart for something more.

programme.title: When God Says Let Go
programme.desc: Is your faith being tested? If you’ve been waiting on the details of what God has next, remember that God doesn’t give a test without a lesson first, so if He’s calling you to let go of something, you can trust He’s already provided you with what you’ll need to take that step.
